bibl.title: The Toronto Ostracon with a Hypothesis of Iliad 20 (2725 Pack2): Re-edition Enlarged with a New Fragment.
bibl.note: O. Ont. Mus. Inv. 906.8-823.2 + 823 + 756 + 968 (= Pack2 2725). Region of Thebes, middle-late second or early third century. - Physical description. - Diplomatic transcript. - Palaeographical notes. - Articulated transcript. - Commentary.
HUYS Marc and Thomas SCHMIDT, The Toronto Ostracon with a Hypothesis of Iliad 20 (2725 Pack2): Re-edition Enlarged with a New Fragment.
